Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.AccessTokenResolver

  • Packages that use AccessTokenResolver 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2
    This package contains the OAuth2 Token validation filter that acts as an OAuth 2 Resource Server.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache
    This package contains classes used to implement an AccessToken cache.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver
    This package defines OpenAM specific logic needed to retrieve an .AccessToken.

    • Uses of AccessTokenResolver in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2

      Constructor and Description
      OAuth2ResourceServerFilter(AccessTokenResolver resolver, BearerTokenExtractor extractor, org.forgerock.util.time.TimeService time)
      Creates a new OAuth2Filter.
      OAuth2ResourceServerFilter(AccessTokenResolver resolver, BearerTokenExtractor extractor, org.forgerock.util.time.TimeService time, Set<String> scopes, String realm)
      Creates a new OAuth2Filter.

    • Uses of AccessTokenResolver in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache

      Classes in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache that implement AccessTokenResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CachingAccessTokenResolver
      A CachingAccessTokenResolver is a delegating AccessTokenResolver that uses a write-through cache to enable fast AccessToken resolution.
      Constructors in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache with parameters of type AccessTokenResolver 
      Constructor and Description
      CachingAccessTokenResolver(AccessTokenResolver resolver, ThreadSafeCache<String,AccessToken> cache)
      Builds a CachingAccessTokenResolver delegating to the given AccessTokenResolver using the given (pre-configured) cache.

    • Uses of AccessTokenResolver in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver

      Classes in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver that implement AccessTokenResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OpenAmAccessTokenResolver
      An OpenAmAccessTokenResolver knows how to resolve a given token identifier against an OpenAm instance.
